Detailed Description

CountryProvider is the provider to retrieve data concerning country codes. An instance of this class is part of the Apoxi Data Control. A pointer to this provider can be retrieved from the main provider via the id:

c_country_provider_id

Following column ids are defined: c_mcc_id :NumberType returns the mobile country code. c_cc_id :NumberType returns the ITU-T E.164 country code. c_country_shortname_id :WStringType returns the countries short name.

NOTE: Please do not instantiate this class.
